mapper.select: SELECT s.studentId as studentId, s.username as studentNo, s.name as studentName, c.className, 85.5 as avgScore, 1 as class_rank, 3 as examCount, 92.5 as passRate, 0.0 as progress, '期中考试' as latestExamType, NOW() as latestExamTime FROM student s JOIN class c ON s.classId = c.classId LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student s JOIN class c ON s.classId = c.classId
